---
name: 'Simple bug report '
about: Create a report to help us improve
title: ''
labels: bug
assignees: ''

---

**Context:**
Give any background info needed, including the mod version, any other mods that were installed, and the in-game setup required to see the bug.

**Actual Behavior:**
Describe exactly what happened that you think is incorrect. Include a screenshot when it is a clear visual issue.

**Expected Behavior:**
Describe what you expected to happen instead of the bug occurring.

**[Possible cause:]** 
(optional)
The underlying cause you think could be behind the bug. For example, the Java code that you think causes the issue, or another known bug that could be causing this one. If you don't know the code, remove this section.
